DOC.brief_summary: The project design examine effectiveness strategy increase access treatment tobacco use dependence among rural Veteran smoker . In addition , examine whether tailored treatment design address common comorbid condition relate cigarette smoking enhances success quit relative enhance standard care . The investigator hypothesize participant assign tailored tobacco cessation intervention report great cessation rate six month . The investigator also anticipate favorable outcome measure depressive symptom , alcohol use , body weight .
DOC.brief_title: Dissemination Tailored Tobacco Quitline Rural Veteran Smokers
DOC.criteria: Veteran status 18 + year age Smoke cigarettes least daily basis Receive primary care Iowa City VA Health Care System affiliate Communitybased Outpatient Clinic ( CBOC ) Live nonmetropolitan area ( base RuralUrban Commuting Area Codes ( RUCA ) code ) Be willing make attempt quit smoke next 30 day Be capable provide informed consent Have access telephone ( land line cell phone ) Have stable residence Planning move within next 12 month Presence terminal illness Pregnancy Unstable psychiatric disorder ( e.g. , acute psychosis ) Currently pregnant Incarcerated Institutionalized
